name: Difficulties with Node.js
description: There are just so many packages to deal with when we are dealing with Node.js.

name: Why async/await is better than then blocks
description: Using async/await allows a lot more flexibility when dealing with functions especially when there are a large number of callback functions.

name: I miss HTML and CSS
description: Life was so much simpler when all I had to worry about was building HTML and CSS. Vanilla JS wasnt too bad, but Node.js is killing me.
